nodes.text: Stobar Spaceport was a spaceport located on Stobar, where the diner Plop Dribble's was located.

During the Clone Wars, the Dathomirian Savage Opress was searching for his brother, Darth Maul, when he trampled through Plop Dribble's before commandeering the services of a Turtle Tanker piloted by a Sakiyan cargo hauler that was docked at the spaceport, in order to reach Lotho Minor. Almost at the same, Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker and his Padawan Ahsoka Tano arrived at the spaceport, hoping to eat something other than government rations, only to find that the diner had been attacked. As the two sat in the diner, Skywalker felt a disturbance in the Force.
